core.name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
desc: During the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</ct> state, when other squad members switch in through a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</ct>, and if Astra Yao expends Energy to release <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</ct> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>22%</ct> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

During the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</ct> state, when other squad members switch in through a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</ct>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</ct> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character:
desc.1: When Energy is consumed to trigger a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</ct>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</ct> and 3 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</ct>.

1.name: 12-Tone Equal Temperament
1.desc: When Astra Yao's attack hits an enemy, the target's All-Attribute RES is reduced by 6%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Upon entering the battlefield, Astra Yao immediately gains 1,000 Decibels. When activating her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</ct> for 60s. When attacked by an enemy, consume <ct color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</ct>, granting Invulnerability for 1s.

flavor.1: "12-tone equal temperament is a musical tuning system, just like how children have to line up, sounds need to be in order too."
flavor.2: "But sounds probably don't like lining up, just like children!"
flavor.3: —Astra Yao's music teacher, recalling when she was six.

2.name: Art of Greed
2.desc: The ATK buff from <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"</ct> is further increased by 19%, with an increased maximum of 400. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</ct> state, when other squad members switch in through a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</ct>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</ct> and 3 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</ct> to attack. This effect can trigger once every 3s.

flavor.0: "The shiniest thing in the world is, of course, love!"
flavor.1: Just like a bird gathering shiny things for its nest, an artist's inner greed is probably to gather all the love in the world. By gathering all the love, one can create the most beautiful melody.

3.name: Interwoven Staff Notation
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: A blank musical staff is a set of parallel lines that never intersect, like souls that have never met, quietly waiting for their melodies to intertwine into a song.
flavor.1: "Let's fill it with notes! And lots and lots of tied notes. It'll make a fantastic song!"
flavor.2: And that's how a new song was created, stretching across 136 bars, all connected with ties...

4.name: "Hair Upon Your Nape"
4.desc: After activating a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, within 15s, Astra Yao can trigger a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> even if she does not have <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chords</ct>. When the attack hits an enemy, the interval for triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is reduced to 1s. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</ct> state, when other squad members enter the field via a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, they will receive different buffs based on their specialty, and this effect can be triggered once every 3s for the entire squad: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct>: The next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> heavy attack on an enemy will deal extra DMG equal to 300% of Astra Yao's ATK; <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct>: The next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> will have 50% increased Anomaly Buildup; <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct>: The next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> will inflict 50% increased Daze.

flavor.0: One hand hovers over the piano
flavor.1: Not sure which note will bring me peace
flavor.4: I seek your shadow through the score
flavor.5: I close my eyes, and see you more
flavor.6: Such as the hair upon your nape

5.name: Proxy and Silk String
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Eve! I've just realized something huge — both you and {M#Wise}{F#Belle} are tall and slim!"
flavor.3: Astra beamed with joy, as if she had uncovered an earth-shattering secret.

6.name: We Are the World
6.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</ct> state, the DMG multiplier for <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</ct> released or followed up with will increase to 200% of the original, and CRIT Rate is increased by 80%. When triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</ct>, Astra Yao will automatically follow up with the charged 3rd-hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: "Capriccio"</ct>, with a 80% increased CRIT Rate. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

flavor.0: The turmoil in the world originates from the solitude of the human heart. If everyone's heart was reciprocated, perhaps all the suffering, sadness, and silence in the world would vanish?
flavor.1: If we could weave this connection with song, would all the cracks heal, and all the pain turn into a beautiful melody, filling the silence? At that point, the world would no longer be a lonely island.
flavor.2: "This song is dedicated to the world!"
